subtasks.title: Install semantic-release and required plugins
subtasks.description: Install semantic-release and plugins (@semantic-release/changelog, @semantic-release/git, @semantic-release/npm) as dev dependencies. These provide the core release automation, changelog generation, git operations, and npm publishing capabilities.

subtasks.title: Create .releaserc.json configuration
subtasks.description: Create .releaserc.json configuration file with branches (main), plugins array with changelog, git, npm plugins configured, and commit message parsing for conventional commits.
acceptanceCriteria: changelog plugin configured to output to CHANGELOG.md
git plugin configured for asset commits
npm plugin configured with appropriate settings

subtasks.title: Add release script and documentation
subtasks.description: Add release script to package.json and document the release process in README.md. Include dry-run instructions and explain how conventional commits map to version bumps.
acceptanceCriteria: Commit type to version bump mapping explained

subtasks.title: Verify semantic-release with dry-run
subtasks.description: Run semantic-release in dry-run mode to verify the configuration works correctly. Ensure changelog generation, version bump detection, and git tag creation work as expected.
acceptanceCriteria: bun run release (dry-run) completes without errors
Version bump is correctly determined from commit types
